# Vigorous Circle (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]], [[6th Level Druid Spells|Druid 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 11]], [[BoXM 11th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 20 ft.

**Target:** One creature/2 levels, no two of which are more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 10 rounds + 1 round/level (max 25 rounds)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 229

This spell functions like *[[Vigor, Mass Lesser (Spell)|mass lesser vigor]]*, except as noted here and that it grants fast healing 3.
